Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Clefable gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Moonblast
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, all enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Magic Guard
Superpowers.Effect: Clefable cannot take damage from special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Cosmic Power
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Clefable adds 1 die to its defense rolls and reduces damage taken from attacks by 1.

Superpowers.Name: Follow Me
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an allied character within Range 2. Until the start of Clefable's next activation, attacks targeting that character must target Clefable instead if possible.

Attacks.Name: Fairy Wind
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Wish
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from Clefable or an allied character within Range 2. Clefable gains the Stagger special condition after using this superpower.
